remarks: 'Less than or equal to' relationship between division and multiplication. (Contributed by NM, 9-Dec-2005.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: ledivmul2OLD $p |- ( ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ C e. RR ) /\ 0 < B ) -> ( ( A / B ) <_ C <-> A <_ ( C x. B ) ) ) $.
